name: Sodium metabisulfite
desc: Sodium metabisulfite or sodium pyrosulfite (IUPAC spelling; Br. E. sodium metabisulphite or sodium pyrosulphite) is an inorganic compound of chemical formula Na2S2O5. The substance is sometimes referred to as disodium metabisulfite. It is used as a disinfectant, antioxidant and preservative agent.
Solubility:
very soluble in glycerol
slightly soluble in ethanol
Related compounds:
Sodium dithionite
Sodium thiosulfate
Sodium sulfate
